quotes.message: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
quotes.name: Marcus Garvey

quotes.message: Esteem cannot be where there is no confidence, and there can be no confidence where there is no respect.
quotes.name: Henry Giles

quotes.message: Insecure people only eclipse your sun because they're jealous of your daylight and tired of their dark, starless nights.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Low self-esteem is no better home to take a refuge.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Sometimes people with low self-esteem will try to punish you for caring about them.
quotes.name: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.message: Most people with low self-esteem have earned it.
quotes.name: George Carlin

quotes.message: I think high self-esteem is overrated. A little low self-esteem is actually quite good. Maybe you're not the best, so you should work a little harder.
quotes.name: Jay Leno

quotes.message: Lack of confidence is what makes you want to change somebody else's mind. When you're OK, you don't need to convince anyone else in order to empower yourself.
quotes.name: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.message: It's not the lack of ability or opportunity that holds you back; it is only a lack of confidence in yourself.
quotes.name: Richard Monckton Milnes

quotes.message: Many of us harbor hidden low self-esteem. We deem everything and everyone more important that ourselves and think that meeting their needs is more important than meeting our own. But if you run out of gas, everyone riding with you will be left stranded.
quotes.name: T. D. Jakes

quotes.message: When you are in the grips of low self-esteem, it's painful, and it certainly doesn't feel like pride. But I believe that this is the dark, quieter side of pride thwarted pride.
quotes.name: Edward T Welch

quotes.message: There is no such thing as perfect security, only varying levels of insecurity.
quotes.name: Salman Rushdie

quotes.message: Most bad behaviour comes from insecurity.
quotes.name: Debra Winger

quotes.message: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.
quotes.name: Vin Diesel

quotes.message: Each one of us requires the spur of insecurity to force us to do our best.
quotes.name: Harold W. Dodds

quotes.message: Of all the traps and pitfalls in life, self-disesteem is the deadliest, and the hardest to overcome, for it is a pit designed and dug by our own hands, summed up in the phrase, 'It's no use - I can't do it.
quotes.name: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.message: Diffidence is a sort of false modesty.
quotes.name: Thackeray

quotes.message: Diffidence is not always innocence
quotes.name: Mme. Necker

quotes.message: Mere bashfulness without merit is awkward.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Bashfulness is an ornament to youth, but a reproach to old age.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Bashfulness is a great hindrance to a man, both in uttering his sentiments and in understanding what is proposed to him; 't is therefore good to press forward with discretion, both in discourse and company of the better sort.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Bashfulness may sometimes exclude pleasure, but seldom opens any avenue to sorrow or remorse.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: When I was small, my most serious handicap was a painful bashfulness in the presence of strangers.
quotes.name: George Mcgovern

quotes.message: Shyness has a strange element of narcissism, a belief that how we look, how we perform, is truly important to other people.
quotes.name: Andre Dubus III

quotes.message: The level of shyness has gone up dramatically in the last decade. I think shyness is an index of social pathology rather than a pathology of the individual.
quotes.name: Philip Zimbardo

quotes.message: Shyness is just egoism out of its depth.
quotes.name: Penelope Keith

quotes.message: There is a shyness about me, and I really need to get out more.
quotes.name: Priscilla Presley

quotes.message: The way you overcome shyness is to become so wrapped up in something that you forget to be afraid.
quotes.name: Claudia Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.message: You know what my greatest personal stumbling block is? My shyness.
quotes.name: Susan Lucci

quotes.message: Self-distrust is the cause of most of our failure. In the assurance of strength there is strength, and, they are the weakest, however strong, who have no faith in themselves or their powers.
quotes.name: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.message: The distrust of wit is the beginning of tyranny.
quotes.name: Edward Abbey

quotes.message: Timidity is a fault for which it is dangerous to reprove persons whom we wish to correct of it.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems so.
quotes.name: Walter Scott

quotes.message: Timidity is a disease of the mind.
quotes.name: Dr. Johnson

quotes.message: Timidity challenges the scorn of women.
quotes.name: Massias

quotes.message: I feel self-doubt whether I'm doing something hard or easy.
quotes.name: Sigourney Weaver

quotes.message: I'm full of self-doubt. I doubt everything I do. Everything I do is a failure.
quotes.name: John Banville

quotes.message: I am incredibly self-deprecating. It stems from self-doubt.
quotes.name: Charlie Cox

quotes.message: Self distrust is good, but only if it leads to trust in God. Otherwise it ends as spiritual paralysis, inability and unwillingness to undertake any course of action.
quotes.name: Alan Cole

quotes.message: Self-doubt kills talent.
quotes.name: Edie McClurg

quotes.message: I know it when I don't know it. Sometimes I know it when I don't think I know it. I need to trust myself in these moments, these rare moments of self-doubt.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: Self-doubt inflicts the deepest wounds.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Excessive fear and self-doubt that were the greatest detractors of personal genius.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Erase self-doubt by working to build your strengths instead of focusing on your weaknesses.
quotes.name: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Diffidence is the right eye of prudence.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I sometimes lack confidence in public, although I am proud enough inwardly.
quotes.name: Robert Schumann

quotes.message: Low self esteem involves imagining the worst that other people can think about you.
quotes.name: Roger Ebert
